original_title: Charlie Crowfoot and the Coati Mundi
overview: An Indian working on an archaeological dig finds an injured coati mundi, names him Cocoa, and nurses him back to health. The rancher, on whose land the Indian is digging, hates the coatis but changes his tune when Cocoa helps save his life. Stars Edward Colunga, Robert Keyworth.
title: Charlie Crowfoot and the Coati Mundi
